metadata.name: ExampleService1
metadata.description: Defined based on the provided array of addresses. Each address can include an IP address or CIDR range and it can include a TCP port number, or a comma-separated list of TCP port numbers. Both the IP/CIDR and port are optional, but you have to specify at least one of them.

metadata.name: ExampleService2
metadata.description: Any process on the host that accepts traffic on port :9092 will be considered to be ExampleService2.
